title: Avatar
overview: A marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Titanic
overview: A love story unfolds on the ill-fated RMS Titanic between a poor artist and a wealthy young woman.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his past crimes.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into chaos.

title: Avengers Infinity War
overview: The Avengers must stop Thanos from collecting powerful stones to destroy half of the universe.

title: Jurassic Park
overview: Scientists bring dinosaurs back to life but lose control of the prehistoric creatures.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against intelligent machines.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: A man with low intelligence witnesses and influences several historical events.

title: Gladiator
overview: A former Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and losing his family.
